displayName.english: THE WORLD OF THE LIVING AWAITS

description.english: Win and escape the Underworld five times.
Win without using any skull rerolls.
Complete a level with more rerolls than you started with.
Score a TOTAL of 2500 or more with a single hand.
Spend at least ten rerolls on a single hand.
Upgrade and play every hand at least once during a run.
Activate at least 15 skulls at once when playing a hand.
Activate at least five skulls at once with a single reroll.
Reduce a level to zero with no room to spare.
Earn praise from Kalma five levels in a row.
Activate at least three skulls at once due to a favourable initial roll.
Play a Three of a Kind.
Play a Four of a Kind.
Play a Five of a Kind.
Win a run with only two colors of skulls in your deck.
Collect all four different color variants of the same skull in a single run.
Win a run without rerolling any dice.
Win a run having played 60 or fewer hands.
Win a run with a blank skull in your deck.
Win a run with the total score of at least 250 000.
